Contents: b"rt @ucla temperatures in los angeles will resemble those of cabo san lucas in the year 2080. although warmer weather sounds nice, @uclaioes's alex hall warns that climate change is more than just a shift in average temperature and precipitation."

Post Title: RT @UCLA Temperatures in Los Angeles will resemble those of Cabo San Lucas in the year 2080. Although warmer weather sounds nice, @UCLAIoES's Alex Hall warns that climate change is more than just a shift in average temperature and precipitation. https://t.co/G6a0lGSmLv
